about_the_game:
Let your fantasy take flight with the sixth charming selection of music tracks!

Karugamo Fantasy BGM 06 brings you more again of your favorites and expands on the popular staples of video game music: mystical, suspense, dramatic, spanish drama, medieval, mystical choirs, fun / whimsical, light-hearted, cut-scene/event and romantic. Whether you're on the lookout for the perfect theme for your epic saga or simply in need of creative music to listen to while you map, you can't go wrong with Karugamo Fantasy!

Features:

  • 27 BGM themes, in M4A and OGG formats.
  • Instruments and composition styles you would find in many JRPGs
  • Royalty-free music you can use in your RPG Maker MV games
